mapper.insert: insert into qb_temp_qbank(content, analysis, answer, type, isFull, hardness, submit_time) values(#{content},#{analysis}, #{answer}, #{type}, #{isFull}, #{hardness}, #{submit_time})

INSERT INTO qb_formal_qbank ( content, analysis, answer, type, isFull, hardness, submit_time ) SELECT content, analysis, answer, type, isFull, hardness, submit_time FROM qb_temp_qbank WHERE qb_temp_qbank.id = #{id}
INSERT INTO qb_formal_knowQuestion (question_id, know_id) SELECT ${formal_id}, qb_temp_knowQuestion.know_id FROM qb_temp_knowQuestion WHERE qb_temp_knowQuestion.question_id = #{temp_id}
mapper.delete: delete from qb_temp_qbank where id=#{id}; delete from qb_temp_knowQuestion where question_id=#{id}
delete from qb_formal_qbank where id=#{id}; delete from qb_formal_knowQuestion where question_id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE qb_temp_qbank SET content=#{content}, answer=#{answer}, analysis=#{analysis}, type=#{type} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT qb_temp_qbank.*, t2.name know_name, qb_question_type.type_name FROM ( SELECT TOP ${pEnd} t1.question_id, t1.subject_name, dbo.AggregateString (t1.question_id) name, row_number () OVER (ORDER BY t1.question_id) n FROM ( SELECT qb_temp_knowQuestion.question_id, TB_Subject.name subject_name FROM TB_Know INNER JOIN TB_Subject ON TB_Subject.id = TB_Know.subjectid AND TB_Subject.name = #{subject} INNER JOIN qb_temp_knowQuestion ON TB_Know.id = qb_temp_knowQuestion.know_id ) t1 GROUP BY t1.question_id, t1.subject_name ) AS t2, qb_temp_qbank, qb_question_type WHERE t2.n >= #{pStart} and t2.question_id=qb_temp_qbank.id and qb_temp_qbank.type=qb_question_type.type
select type from qb_question_type where type_name=#{type_name}

SELECT qb_temp_qbank.*, t1.subjectid subject_id, t1.know_name FROM ( SELECT qb_temp_qbank.id, TB_Know.subjectid, dbo.AggregateString (qb_temp_qbank.id) know_name FROM qb_temp_qbank INNER JOIN qb_temp_knowQuestion ON qb_temp_qbank.id = #{id} AND qb_temp_qbank.id = qb_temp_knowQuestion.question_id INNER JOIN TB_Know ON qb_temp_knowQuestion.know_id = TB_Know.id GROUP BY qb_temp_qbank.id, subjectid ) t1, qb_temp_qbank WHERE t1.id = qb_temp_qbank.id
